name: Mars Blast VR(Oculus)
description:
Race through Mars and destroy everything in your way, how far will you get ?

Mars Blast is an endless running shooter heavily influenced by old arcade games.
It is made exclusively for the Oculus Rift and the Xbox Controller that comes with it, sadly there is no touch support.

If you have any issues/bugs or if you just really want to say something regarding the game, please leave a comment!

Made by 1st year game dev students at Nord University, Steinkjer, Norway
